variable.name: cl_parseFunChars

value.description: You can use Ocrana LED's by hand right out of the console and chat anonymously through "$\" without showing your name (chat messages that are seen without your name at the beginning).

variable.remarks: Full list: $R - red lamp $G - green lamp $B - blue lamp $Y - yellow lamp $\ - carridge return $( - big left bracket $= - big equal sign $) - big right bracket $. - red middle dot $, - white dot (names only) $< - small left bracket $- - small equal sign $> - small right bracket $a - big grey block $: - line feed $b - filled red block $d - right pointing red arrow $[ - gold left square bracket $] - gold right square bracket $^ - white ^ (names only) ^x - red x (names only) $0-9 - yellow number $xyy - char with hex code yy (In order to use the lamps, you'll need the Ocrana pak).
